.. _`DGN enrichment`:

DGN ENRICHMENT
==============

Perform enrichment analysis on DisGeNET





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_enrichDGN:
        input:
            rds = "geneList.RDS"
        output:
            rds = "enrichDGN.RDS",
            tsv = "enrichDGN.tsv"
        params:
            enrichDGN_extra = "ont = 'DOLite'"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/clusterProfiler/enrichDGN"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

The geneList object if described in the
DESeq2_to_geneList wrapper

Parameters:
  * enrichdgn_extra: Extra parameters for enrichDGN, besides "gene", "universe", and "readable"
  * organism: Either Hs or Mm




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
